alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Davidson; Marshall; Maury; Rutherford; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 6:17PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Davidson, northeastern Marshall, southwestern Rutherford, northeastern Maury, eastern Williamson and northwestern Bedford Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 617 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Spring Hill, or 14 miles south of Franklin, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Franklin, Columbia, Smyrna, Brentwood, La Vergne, Spring Hill, Nolensville, Thompson`s Station, Chapel Hill, Eagleville, I-65 East Of Columbia, Triune, Rover, Rockvale and Unionville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bedford; Davidson; Marshall; Maury; Rutherford; Williamson
